Title: Animator3D
Description:
3D Animation with WPF. This project contains two WPF products:
1. An editor to create 3D animations using skeleton animation.
2. A runtime library to use the animations in WPF applications.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
3D Animation with WPF. This project contains two WPF products:
1. An editor to create 3D animations using skeleton animation.
2. A runtime library to use the animations in WPF applications.

Current Status
An initial upload has been added to source control. A demo and screenshots will be released shortly.
